alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Little River (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 12:54AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Little River, southern Hempstead, northeastern Miller and northeastern Lafayette Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1254 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Saratoga to near Fouke. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. A 39 mph wind gust was measured at the Texarkana Regional Airport with these storms at 1245 AM. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hope, Stamps, Lewisville, Fouke, Perrytown, Garland, Fulton, Genoa, McNab, Patmos, Millwood, Hervey, Spirit Lake, Homan, Piney Grove and Red Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
